main event: A sighting of multiple unidentified aerial objects occurring on July 12, 1958, in Grand Rapids, Michigan.
interesting points: The sighting involved various objects described as blinking and pulsating different colors including white and red, Objects disappeared instantaneously after being observed, One object was described as cigar-shaped and moving from NW to SE, It was confirmed that some objects were satellites such as Sputnik, Visibility during the sighting was reported to be clear with no unusual activity noted.
